function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high concentration of virus-laden air","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission and higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Implementing enhanced ventilation systems and air filtration, and ensuring appropriate distribution of ventilation","Technologies":"Advanced filtration systems, mechanical ventilation, air-cleaning devices","People":"Occupants of public buildings, residential houses, and apartments","Owner":"Building managers, homeowners, and residents"},{"Description":"Lack of recognition of ventilation as a critical method for reducing airborne transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of viral concentration indoors and higher likelihood of infection","Mitigation":"Educating individuals and stakeholders on the importance of ventilation, and advocating for the implementation of ventilation measures","Technologies":"Education and awareness campaigns, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"General public, building occupants, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, building managers, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Inadequate distribution of ventilation leading to inadequate dilution of contaminated air","Impact":"Uneven distribution of clean air and potential pockets of high viral concentration","Mitigation":"Ensuring appropriate placement of supply and exhaust vents, and optimizing ventilation system design","Technologies":"Airflow modeling, ventilation monitoring and control systems","People":"Occupants of buildings and homes","Owner":"Building managers, architects, homeowners"}]}
